artist: Artist: Toyohara Chikanobu; Publisher: Fukuda Hatsujirō
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: six leaves attached together to form one image in album: procession of men carrying large palanquin, boxes, and walking with horses; large, crooked pine tree cuts over scene at R; portion of shrine in background
markings:
